tedLasso.featureDescription:
This is a feature I was asked to build as a coding example for a job interview. The task was defined as follows:

Goal:
Create a fan app for the TV show “Ted Lasso” using React Native and the TVMaze API. This challenge is intended to assess your skills as a Senior React Native Developer. Feel free to use any libraries or tools that enhance your productivity and showcase your proficiency.

Scope:
Fetch and Display Show Data:
Retrieve and display data for “Ted Lasso,” including the list of episodes.

Episode Details:
Allow users to navigate into a single episode and view its details.

Favorites Feature:
Enable users to mark episodes as favorites.
Persist favorite selections locally (not just in memory).
